description.ruby-sapphire:
Makes the foe laugh to
lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.
description.emerald:
Makes the foe laugh to
lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is made to
laugh, reducing its
ATTACK and DEFENSE
stats.

foe into laughing,
reducing its Attack
and Defense stats.
